alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 23 at 1:51AM MDT until October 24 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 to 70 mph expected today, with winds shifting to the west 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph Monday. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 8 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds will be particularly hazardous at higher elevations where the strongest winds are likely to occur. Be especially careful driving in these mountainous areas. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
